Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 64GB Smartphone - Black - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished
comment: Went to the Apple store and it did not pass the RF CELLULAR TEST. According to the history, this test was done back on May 19th in JAPAN and it failed the test. I do not want any connectivity problems (problem related to the antennas - has an impact on the connection and LTE) which seems to be an issue with this product. I understand this is a refurbished telephone, but it did not even pass the basic test. Very disappointed.  The Apple store employee also said the screen might not be an original, but a third-party screen. the box, the sticker, and the charger (not original) are also very sketchy. Not like an original...

product_name: Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 64GB Smartphone - Black - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished
comment: I’ve bought a iPhone from Best Buy a year ago so I decided to trust them again and bought the purple iPhone 11. Took basically a week to process and it was shipped to me very quickly. The phone is in very good condition, it has 100% battery health, no scratches or anything, brand new! I recommend this seller <3

product_name: Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 64GB Smartphone - Black - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished
comment: The phone was in excellent cosmetic condition.  However, when setting up the phone it stated a warning that the glass was not a certified apple product.  I wasn’t overly concerned and figured the glass must have been replaced.  When I brought it to a store to have a screen protector installed the workers tried several times to install different protectors but it wouldn’t seal properly.  The phone well for the first few weeks but then the screen stopped being reactive to touch.  Will need to return the phone.  The seller was fast to respond to the return request.  Hopefully the refund process goes smoothly!

product_name: Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 64GB Smartphone - Black - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished
comment: I bought 2 one purple and one black 64 gb the battery health on the purple was 97% and on the black one was 100, there is no miner damage only on the purple one had a little scratch from a case or something but the black one came in brand new. I definitely recommend this seller.

product_name: Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 64GB Smartphone - Black - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished
comment: I bought this phone thinking it was going to work normally. When I took it out of the package is looked like it was brand new and it worked perfectly for about 4 hours before it decided to stop working. The battery failed on me and the phone kept constantly restarting and I couldn't do anything to fix it. They say its "tested for complete functionality", but Im here to tell you that some of them are not. Might as well just shop for a factory new Iphone. Waste of money Im hoping to get back.

product_name: Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 64GB Smartphone - Black - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished
comment: This refurbished iPhone 11 is of the same quality as new iPhone, just half the price. There are no scratches or cracks on the exterior (including the camera and sides), battery heath is 100%, and the screen is responsive. The phone was clean upon arrival (no dust in the ports or speakers, etc.). Overall, this product was a very good purchase.

product_name: Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 64GB Smartphone - Black - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished
comment: This phone is good, arrived quick and seems perfect but the front camera is nothing compared to the quality of my iPhone X, and the message that the “display is not a genuine apple part” will never go away in setting so that is inconvenience for sure.

product_name: Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 64GB Smartphone - Black - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished
comment:
Just got my iPhone today, was exactly what I was expecting and appears to be brand new! 

However one thing to note is that under parts and services history I have an error message saying display has unknown parts. This is not affecting the phone at all currently but could be a cause of concern down the road.

product_name: Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 64GB Smartphone - Black - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished
comment: As I was reading the reviews, some said it was a poor phone but others said it was an excellent one. This made me scared cause I thought I was gonna be one of the unlucky people and get a poor phone as well. Thankfully I got a good quality phone with a 97% maximum capacity. There were no lags but a little dent on the side of the phone. Other than that I could proudly say I was one of the lucky ones to get a good phone. In my opinion, I would buy this phone but I can't promise you'd get a great phone like me (hopefully you do tho)

product_name: Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 64GB Smartphone - Black - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished

product_name: Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 64GB Smartphone - Black - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished

Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 Pro 64GB Smartphone - Space Gray - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished
comment: I received my iPhone 11 Pro today, the delivery exceeded my expectations, it arrived directly on time (3 days). The phone itself had no scratches nor any dents. The only problem that I found with this product was the battery, the battery life was capped at 85%, which isn't too bad or too good either. So if you're a person that is mainly looking for a good battery phone I wouldn't recommend certified refurbished products because you're only gonna be testing your luck. But if you like iPhones for their camera, I'd definitely recommend this. Obviously the phone didn't come in a retail box, but it did come with a new charger and sim card ejector.

product_name: Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 Pro 64GB Smartphone - Space Gray - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished
comment:
On July 29th, I receive this item. After 20 minutes of use, I see a green line of death on the screen of my iPhone which appears few minutes and disappears it's awful to use an iPhone like that. I contact immediately apple assistant for understanding the real problem, I try to upload ios, rest, change luminosity .. but all these solutions don't work. the green line of death is still on my screen.Finally, we concluded that there hardware problem.
Also, I notice two other problems the health battery is 94% weak and the phone charger is not original.
the worst is that I don't have contact with this company, also, I wait three days without receiving any response to my comment.

product_name: Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 Pro 64GB Smartphone - Space Gray - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished
comment:
I bought this for my dad and at first we had issues with using the phone because even though the seller has advertised it as unlocked, it is not!! So I had to take it to a local cellphone store to unlock it for me for money. On top of that my dad just informed me he can barely hear from the speaker when he’s on calls. The loud speaker is working but the normal speaker for calls is not. 

I tried to reach the seller at both incidents and no response! I am really disappointed because this was supposed to be a present for my dad and he can’t even use the phone.

product_name: Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 Pro 64GB Smartphone - Space Gray - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished
comment: This iphone 11 came better than expected. I expected scratches on the back and front but there's nothing I could see. There may be micro scratches but nothing that than eye would discover. Another thing, the battery was surprising great. Before purchasing on bestbuy I was looking on facebook market place and amazon for the best price. Best buy and this seller had the best price for the Iphone 11 pro, Especially with he battery health, way better than all that I have contacted from the facebook marketplace and amazon. My iPhone 11 pro battery health came as 92% a lot of the other marketplaces had a total of 85% or lower and they were charging up to 800 as well. However for some, my iPhone rear camera has some scratches but it doesn't impact the visual or the taking pictures or videos. Mine also came with a screen protector, but I will be replacing that. Overall I recommend this refurbished phone.

product_name: Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 Pro 64GB Smartphone - Space Gray - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished
comment: At first I was skeptical about buying a recertified phone from a reseller but now I'm glad I made that decision.(saved like 500) Was looking for the iphone 11 pro because I really dig the round edges but it seems to be discontinued. Mine came in 10/10 condition as if I bought it from apple. Expectations definitely exceeded!!

product_name: Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 Pro 64GB Smartphone - Space Gray - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished
comment:

I received a phone with no dings, no scratches, box and new earphones included.

product_name: Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 Pro 64GB Smartphone - Space Gray - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished
comment: Canada's consumer watchdog series uncovers wrongdoings in the Best Buy Marketplace of refurb products! Buyer be ware ! Best Buy simply leases space on heir website but do little to no vetting of sellers. Look up the investigation.

product_name: Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 Pro 64GB Smartphone - Space Gray - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished
comment: Upon getting the phone, the IOS itself told me that the screen was not a genuine apple product. After using it for just a week, I can confirm that it was right. The screen rarely recognizes when you touch the screen, and when it does, it thinks you've touched it 600 times. Anything that requires you to hold your finger on the screen is impossible, as you don't decide when you've lifted your finger; the phone does.

product_name: Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 Pro 64GB Smartphone - Space Gray - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished
comment:
Ordered an iphone xs from these guys. i had the phone for 13 days. it now won’t charge over 0% (screen literally says 0% remaining) and will not charge. had to use my little brothers phone in order to contact them as well as make this review because if i touch my phone screen, it’s shuts off. i’m so disappointed.  
i contacted them a few days ago and still haven’t heard back. i don’t suggest buying their items.

product_name: Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 Pro 64GB Smartphone - Space Gray - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished

Will be buying more phones from this seller in the future!!

product_name: Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 Pro 64GB Smartphone - Space Gray - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished

product_name: Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 Pro 64GB Smartphone - Space Gray - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished
comment: If I could give 0 stars I would. The first phone they sent me was defective, it overheated. Then the company replaced it and sent me an iPhone 11 pro max, but that phone was also defective. this time it was the screen and GPU, the iPhone was lagging on SUBWAY SURFERS. Then they replaced the screen on that phone, but that did not solve my problem. I contacted them again, which is a very time-consuming thing to do because you have to basically spam a couple of times for them to respond, one time they didn't respond for 5 business days. Finally, they sent me another replacement phone, but when I went to pick this one up, the store would not give it to me because this Device Care company didn't communicate with them properly so I had to drive back, wasting a ton of fuel and time. When I tried to contact them afterward about this they sent me an email saying: please do not contact us.., Then I had to call them without my caller id so they would call me, After a week or so, of dealing with that I finally received my replacement, which is now my current iPhone,  but it is still defective and has screen lag. I do not have the time and energy to contact this unresponsive company again so I am just dealing with the fact that I can't play even 50-megabyte games on my iPhone. I would really suggest not giving your business to this company.

Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 Pro Max 64GB Smartphone - Space Gray - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished
comment:
Too good to be true

- A general tip of advice for those in the market for a new phone, do not buy refurbished from any 3rd party companies, only purchase from true primary retailers (apple) or owners. 
- This phone did not have a genuine display which seriously showed, my iPhone 8 had a better display especially at night. 
- The poor display caused the battery to significantly underperform, there were consistent and sudden drops in battery percentage, although the battery health indicated 88%

TAKEAWAY:  Save your money and buy from original owners on Kijiji or buy refurbished from Apple

Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 12 128GB Smartphone - Blue - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished
comment:
The phone arrived in pretty near-perfect condition. No noticeable scratches, extremely little wear... it practically looked brand new. Over the last few days it's been fully operational. The battery's capacity was at 87%, but that's fairly reasonable for a used product. My only gripe so far is that the charging cable that came with it felt non-legitimate, but eh, fair enough.

However... be cautious as to which seller is offering the phone. I've seen the "sold and shipped" section change from Device Care to Lucells. My purchase was from Device Care, not anyone else.

From looking at Device Care's overall reviews, it looks like they'll replace broken screens / batteries them with non-legitimate / non-certified parts. If that's a big deal to you, then you may want to take some caution when deciding if this is a good option.

Just be aware to look into the seller's reviews to get a general consensus first. Would be a hassle for you to get a broken phone and have to send it back.

comment: I ordered this phone before the other bad review was written but mine turned out to be in perfect condition other than a few barely noticeable scratches the screen. After a week it is great, battery lasts more than a day for me. Took about a month to arrive though so that was aggravating

product_name: Apple iPhone 14 128GB - Blue - Unlocked
comment: Suraj is very helpful. He was with me for almost 4 hours and giving me every information I need also he helped me a lot. Due to him my experience with best buy was amazing and now I will be every electronics item from best buy

product_name: Apple iPhone 14 128GB - Blue - Unlocked
Apple iPhone 14 128GB - Blue - Unlocked
Refurbished (Excellent) - Apple iPhone 11 64GB Smartphone - Purple - Unlocked - Certified Refurbished
comment:
Arrived on July 1st, the exterior of the phone looks fine but there were minor scratches. 
Just to check the audio, I tried to play a song and it legit sounds just like a dead kitten screaming. Also arrived with a battery life of 81%... I don't really think this is what an excellent graded product looks like. They definitely did not check the quality of their product before sending it. Was not updated to the recent software like they said they have, I had to update it myself, which took 3 hours lol. The package was a bit damaged upon arrival.
